title: Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH), Do What You Said You Would Do
description:
Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) discusses the investigations by Congress conducted during his time on the House Judiciary and Oversight Committees and reflects on the Trump presidency. He's interviewed by former Congressman Dave Brat (R-VA).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
